name: Carnival Games: Wild West 3D
summary: "Howdy partner! It’s time to switch on your swagger and step right up to Carnival Games Wild West 3D! You’re in for a rootin’ tootin’ good time as 25 Wild West games and attractions, built from the ground up for the Nintendo 3DS, come to life in eye poppin’ 3D and take full advantage of the motion sensor and gyro sensor system capabilities."
